name: The Cursed Revolver
description: The Wild West is plunged into chaos when the land is cursed by an artifact known simply as, The Cursed Revolver. Discovered by an unsuspecting cowboy, the revolver becomes bound to him, and demands payment of life. The cowboy must now face the deadly demons of the west if he is to have any hope of breaking the curse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated or Discreet DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: No
